title: WebApp Admin Panel-Backend
description: ＞﹏＜Building a complete admin panel with secure admin access and full control over employees and users, including product and order management modules with role-based authentication and secure login.＞﹏＜ Engineered a product upload and order, dynamic product filtering, search, export-to-Excel functionality, logging reports, and rate limiting for enhanced security and performance

title: Portfolio
description: This project showcases my skills as a web developer, including my ability to build responsive websites, work with JavaScript frameworks, and integrate various web technologies.

title: Jotter Storage Management System – MERN Stack Web App
description: ＞﹏＜Developed a cloud-style file management system allowing users to sign up/login with Google, create folders,and upload files, images, and PDFs.＞﹏＜Implemented admin controls for storage limits and user restrictions, including analytics of total files, folders,images, and visualization of remaining space.

title: Employee Management System
description: The app is for solving employee management problem.You can login as Admin and create Employee Account and give task to them. track there task add new task and delete task. Search Employee to show there Working Progress and An Employee also Login using there Id And Password. they can submit there task and Let the Admin Know About Status of the work. The Frontend Host in Vercel and Own Hosting the BackEnd Host In Render

title: BajarAnioDotCom – Node.js Backend Project
description: ＞﹏＜Building a person-to-person daily grocery reminder app with secure authentication, allowing users to connect via request/accept workflow.＞﹏＜Only connected users can send grocery lists, add notes, and track checklist items; notifications are sent to the list owner when items are purchased.

title: javascript Project Hub
description: This project is a place where you can find good ideas to make small frontend projects.This Project has 2 version one with full stack with backend With Express js and option to upload project using upload portal and one is static. Also to Store Data We use Image for Cloudinary and Database for mongoDb. The live one is Static One and Both one is in Github as Branch

title: CodeVault
description: CodeVault is a React-Tailwind application designed for Store, Organize, and Share Your Code & Command-Line Snippets.Storing Data in LocalStorage.

title: Alpha eCommerce Clone
description: A fully responsive eCommerce website clone built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This project demonstrates a modern and visually appealing eCommerce layout with interactive features.

title: Image Search Engine
description: An Image Search Engine that allows users to search for images using the Unsplash API. Users can view images in a grid layout and download their favorites with a simple click.
